entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 22 with temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 22 with temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
